title: Watashi ni Tenshi ga Maiorita!
overview: Miyako Hoshino is a college student who is very shy around strangers. When her younger sister Hinata brings home her classmate, Hana Shirosaki, Miyako becomes enchanted by her cuteness and begins having her dress up in cosplay in exchange for snacks. The series follows Miyako as she grows closer to Hana, along with Hinata's other friends.
